item.title: Alicia Silverstone: Yes, I Still Sleep with My 11-Year Old Son. So What?!?
item.dc:creator: Kay D. Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: 3 minutesAlicia Silverstone made headlines in 2022 for saying she still sleeps with her 11-year old son.

Alicia Silverstone: Yes, I Still Sleep with My 11-Year Old Son. So What?!? was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 3 minutes

There’s no shame in her parenting game.

During a July 19 appearance on The Ellen Fisher Podcast, Alicia Silverstone made headlines when she also made an admission about one aspect of her ongoing motherhood.

“Bear and I still sleep together,” the actress said of her 11-year old son, adding:

“And I’ll be in trouble for saying that. But I don’t really care.”

Best known for her iconic role in Clueless, Silverstone explained that she abides by a “natural” style of parenting … and compared keeping Bear near her in the same way animals keep their young close to them.

“I’m a natural mama. And I just do what’s natural. I’m a loving mama,” the star elaborated.

“I believe in love, I believe in nature and our society is scared of nature and scared of love.

“If you were in any kind of wild setting where there are animals, if you put your baby over there, your baby is going to get eaten.

“So, it’s not ideal for the baby to be over there.”

Silverstone shares her son with ex-husband Christopher Jarecki.

She continued during the aforementioned appearance about how she followed a tactic called “elimination communication” when raising Bear, stating that she would rarely use diapers when teaching her kid to potty train as a toddler, for example.

Instead of diapers, Silverstone would “watch his cues” to know when Bear would need to use the restroom.

“It’s so awesome. It’s so easy,” she said.

“When I was done feeding him, he would go to the bathroom in the toilet. When he woke up from a nap, he went to the bathroom.”

Silverstone has long been vocal about her allegedly unconventional parenting methods.

In June 2020, as another example, Silverstone said that she had been taking baths with her then 9-year-old son during COVID quarantine.

She also said they danced, jumped rope and went on the trampoline often together.

Elsewhere, Silverstone has faced criticism for feeding her son an all vegan diet.

“People said lots of different things, and I was sort of ‘the freak,’ and I guess I’ll take pride in that because it is hard to be the person that’s speaking out, and it is hard to be the person that is saying the thing that isn’t what everybody else wants to hear,” she noted on the podcast.

In conclusion, the actress said she tries hard not to judge anyone else.

She knows that being mother “is the most precious, most unbelievable experience in this world.”

However, Silverstone believes “it’s not for everyone and anybody who doesn’t want to do it shouldn’t do it.”

Alicia Silverstone: Yes, I Still Sleep with My 11-Year Old Son. So What?!? was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Alicia Silverstone’s Brother ARRESTED For Growing Weed; Bowe Berghdahl Found on …
item.dc:creator: Starlight Glitterhooter
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesAlicia Silverstone’s brother David Silverstone was arrested on marijuana charges in Redwood Valley, California, on Tuesday. David, 43, was arrested …

Alicia Silverstone’s Brother ARRESTED For Growing Weed; Bowe Berghdahl Found on … was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Alicia Silverstone’s brother David Silverstone was arrested on marijuana charges in Redwood Valley, California, on Tuesday.

David, 43, was arrested on charges of cultivating and processing marijuana as well as possession of marijuana for sale, according to the Mendocino County Sheriff’s Office website.

The brother of the Clueless actress reportedly had 181 plants seized from his farm, which is located about 120 miles north of San Francisco.

At first, this seems like a normal busted-for-pot story.  But the raid also turned up high-profile U.S. Army deserter Bowe Berghdahl.

Berghdahl just happened to be visiting David at the time of the raid. Investigators do not believe he was involved with David’s illegal growing operation.

The solider was captured by the Taliban, and the United States later exchanged five senior Taliban officials from Guantanamo Bay for Berghdahl.

The exchange was a controversial decision and received significant media attention. He is now awaiting a grand jury hearing.

David’s fate might be more hopeful. He was released an hour after he was booked Tuesday night. His bond was listed at $25,000.

Alicia Silverstone’s rep did not respond to a request for comment.

Alicia is an advocate for eco-living, penning a diet book, developing a website, and even starting a clothing line promoting her holistic lifestyle.

David, who worked on movie sets in the 90s, is also a poster child for green living … and we’re not just talking about marijuana plants.

His Facebook posts gloat about his green thumb, showing off pictures of his fruits and vegetables.

Celebrity Mug Shots: BOOK ‘EM!

VIEW GALLERY

Alicia Silverstone’s Brother ARRESTED For Growing Weed; Bowe Berghdahl Found on … was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Clueless Cast: Where Are They Now?
item.dc:creator: Tyler Johnson
item.description:
As if! Whatever! Surfing the crimson wave! It’s impossible and depressing to believe, but the classic comedy Clueless came out …

Clueless Cast: Where Are They Now? was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
As if! Whatever! Surfing the crimson wave!

It’s impossible and depressing to believe, but the classic comedy Clueless came out 20 years ago, in 1995.

It introduced the world to Alicia Silverstone, to Paul Rudd and to a number of expressions that are still used (in jest or in seriousness) to this day.

Seriously, where else have Ren and Stimpy been referred to as “way existential?”

The movie has aged very well. But have its stars? Take a look below at where the cast of Clueless is today:

Clueless Cast: Where Are They Now? was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: 11 Alicia Silverstone Quotes: Clueless Quips From a Complete Quack
item.dc:creator: Tattle Taylor
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesAlicia Silverstone’s Kind Mama parenting book is taking the Internet by storm, and not in a good way. If you …

11 Alicia Silverstone Quotes: Clueless Quips From a Complete Quack was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Alicia Silverstone’s Kind Mama parenting book is taking the Internet by storm, and not in a good way. If you haven’t heard about it, here’s a synopsis:

In Kind Mama, Alicia Silverstone claims to have the answers regarding how to avoid things like cancer, thyroid conditions, diabetes, infertility, and depression. 

Basically, her answer is "eat more plants." She calls them "kind foods" but that’s it in a nutshell. And she sort of comes off sounding like a big ol’ nut. See?

11 Dumb Alicia Silverstone Kind Mama Quotes

VIEW GALLERY

If you listen to Alicia Silverstone, you need to:

  1. Stop using tampons because your "chichi" will absorb phthalates.
  2. Practice the "kind mama" way to avoid postpartum depression.
  3. NOT vaccinate your kids because of anecdotes, which, FYI are NOT science.
 

So maybe she’s on to something with the chemicals in tampons, but tampon manufacturers probably aren’t out to get us. And any woman who calls her vagina a "chichi" loses any and all respectability points.

If you can’t say "vagina" in public, maybe don’t be talking about them. Shailene Woodley, who is not a mom, has no trouble saying the word vagina out loud. And she’s pretty open about what she lets hers absorb.

Silverstone REALLY riled up the postpartum support community with her comments that "kind mamas" don’t typically get postpartum depression.

According to Postpartum Progress, the most widely read blog IN THE WORLD on perinatal mood and anxiety disorders, 1 in 7 women will experience a postpartum depression and/or anxiety and that’s only the cases that get diagnosed.

1. In. 7.

Telling moms who’ve survived what she herself was lucky not to experience that if only they’d done things her way they wouldn’t have suffered is, well, a load of crap. 

And finally, but certainly not the least offensive thing to come out of her book, Alicia Silverstone doesn’t believe in vaccinating her children against childhood and now-eradicated diseases. (Diseases which were eradicated because of vaccines…)

She joins the likes of Kristin Cavallari and Jenny McCarthy who also believe that there’s a link between vaccines and the rising rates of autism despite any scientific evidence linking the two.

Perhaps we shouldn’t be taking parenting advice from someone whose biggest claim to fame remains a film she made in 1995 where she played a ditzy high school student eager to lose her virginity. 

11 Alicia Silverstone Quotes: Clueless Quips From a Complete Quack was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Alicia Silverstone DESTROYS Vaccines, Tampons, Depression, Cancer in “Kind …
item.dc:creator: Free Britney
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesAlicia Silverstone has some … pretty interesting views on parenting. Because she’s Alicia Silverstone, an obvious expert on the subject, …

Alicia Silverstone DESTROYS Vaccines, Tampons, Depression, Cancer in “Kind … was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Alicia Silverstone has some … pretty interesting views on parenting.

Because she’s Alicia Silverstone, an obvious expert on the subject, she’s decided to transcribe them in book form. And oh, how enlightened the public will be.

If you thought chewing her kid’s food for him was a bit strange, that’s got nothing on some of the views espoused in her new tome, The Kind Mama.

Somewhere, Kristin Cavallari and Jenny McCarthy are PSYCHED … because they’ve been dethroned as the new poster parent who hates vaccines.

Shots are just "aluminum and formaldehyde," after all. Alicia writes:

“While there has not been a conclusive study of the negative effects of such a rigorous one-size-fits-all, shoot-’em-up schedule, there is increasing anecdotal evidence from doctors who have gotten distressed phone calls from parents claiming their child was ‘never the same’ after receiving a vaccine. And I personally have friends whose babies were drastically affected in this way.”

Also, your tampons are ruining you, ladies. Just absolutely killing your body:

 

“Your chichi is the most absorbent part of your body. Unfortunately, feminine-care manufacturers aren’t required to tell you what’s in their products, which means that no one’s talking about the potential pesticide residues from non-organic cotton and the ‘fragrances’ containing hormone-upsetting, fertility-knocking phthalates that are snuggling up to your hoo-ha.”

Oh, and you suck at parenting if you’re ever down in the dumps. She goes on:

“Though it’s less common among kind mamas, some women experience the blues after giving birth.”

Hear that? Follow her advice and you won’t be depressed! It’s that simple!

But why should you listen to the wisdom Alicia Silverstone of all people?

Because her book is, for all intents and purposes, one magic cure-all:

“[This book can] help prevent or even cure your PMS, insomnia, allergies, breakouts, weight struggles, thyroid condition, lupus, multiple sclerosis … while significantly lowering your risk of heart disease, diabetes, and cancer."

So to make a long story short, Alicia Silverstone is basically God.

How else do you explain a book that will rid you of that silly postpartum depression, rid your body and your child’s of lethal toxins AND stave off cancer?

Where have you been all our lives, AS?? Bow down.

Alicia Silverstone DESTROYS Vaccines, Tampons, Depression, Cancer in “Kind … was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
